    C

    ChangeClassButton - Class in ui.buttons
    Represents a button in the UI that resets the battle counter and changes the screen to player selection.
    ChangeClassButton() - Constructor for class ui.buttons.ChangeClassButton
    Constructs a button with the text "Change Class" and adds an action listener to handle button clicks.
    changeToBattle() - Static method in class ui.PanelManager
    Switches the main frame to the battle panel.
    changeToCredits() - Static method in class ui.PanelManager
    Switches the main frame to the credits panel.
    changeToPlayerSelection() - Static method in class ui.PanelManager
    Switches the main frame to the player selection panel.
    changeToTittleScreen() - Static method in class ui.PanelManager
    Switches the main frame to the title screen panel.
    clearText() - Method in class ui.BattleTextArea
    Clears the text in the battle text area.
    create() - Method in interface game.enemyfactory.EnemyFactory
    Creates a new enemy instance.
    create() - Method in class game.enemyfactory.RandomBossFactory
    Creates a random boss enemy.
    create() - Method in class game.enemyfactory.RandomDifficultEnemyFactory
    Creates a random difficult enemy.
    create() - Method in class game.enemyfactory.RandomEnemyFactory
    Creates a random easy enemy.
    createBattle() - Method in class game.Game
    Creates a new battle with a random enemy or boss depending on how many battles have been played
    CreditsPanel - Class in ui.panels.mainpanels
    Represents the credits panel in the game interface.
    CreditsPanel() - Constructor for class ui.panels.mainpanels.CreditsPanel
    Creates a new CreditsPanel with a black background and a label displaying "fin".
